bug.author: manuelhaussmann
bug.description: Several parts of the Trainer class require a location to save to but don't complain until it is too late. Examples are (of course) when a save point is specified via save_every, but the trainer also defaults to saving after a validation run even without a necessary directory.

comments.comment: Agreed, this should be handled better.

Had another look, and you're right that <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nasimrahaman/inferno/blob/e846592e5a660d972ab6eeaf46cb92656f88c792/inferno/trainers/basic.py#L81>this</denchmark-link> should definitely default to False.
